Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back View gallery / Back Coomera Houseboats Gold Coast Coomera Houseboats Holidays Island Escape Gold Coast 3 Night Houseboat Hire Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Explore the idyllic South Queensland waterways of the Gold Coast and lower Moreton Bay, with Coomera Houseboats Holidays. Located just 65km from Brisbane or only 50km from Gold Coast Airport you’ll have over 50 km of cruising ground, secluded beaches and islands including Stradbroke Island to enjoy. Be the skipper of your private fully equipped holiday houseboat with no licence needed, accommodating up to 12 crew - 60-foot four bedrooms vessel with or without spa and include air conditioning and all modern conveniences. Take family or friends and enjoy a cruise and laze at your leisure, have fun with swimming, kayaking or fishing or explore and Island hop! Whether it is for a family holiday, a friends getaway, a romantic escape or a boys fishing trip, welcome aboard! View more View less 3 nights from $ 4615 Total per Houseboat (based on up to 8 people). Flights are additional Enquire now Sale Period : until 31 Mar 26 or until sold out Deal Includes 3 Night Self-Contained Self-Drive Houseboat Hire (up to 8 people) Houseboat Hire as specified (departs Mon or Fri) Briefing by licensed skipper Motoring charge for 6 hours per Houseboat Generator charges of 12 hours for 4 Cabin Houseboat & 24 hours for all SPA Houseboat Dinghy with 3 hour outboard engine hire including 5L fuel 1 Fishing Rod hire & bait 1 Kayak hire Linen and towels per houseboat & cleaning fees Support while on the water One FREE jetty drive in/drive out per charter by licensed skipper during office hours Room Types 4 CABIN "SHENANIGANS" Bedding configuration: 2 x queen, 4 x single. Extra bedding available on request at additional charge. Bedding is subject to availability. 3 night package from $4615 total per houseboat (max 8 people). Departures on Monday & Friday's Travel 01 Nov - 30 Nov 25, 01 Dec - 14 Dec 25, 17 Jan - 31 Jan 26, 01 Feb - 31 Mar 26 SPA 4 CABIN "BLUE SKY OR AEGEAN 60" Bedding configuration: 4 x queen or 2 x queen + 4 x single. Extra bedding available on request at additional charge. Bedding is subject to availability. 3 night package from $5609 total per houseboat (max 8 people). Departures on Monday & Friday's Travel 01 Nov - 30 Nov 25, 01 Dec - 14 Dec 25, 17 Jan - 31 Jan 26, 01 Feb - 31 Mar 26 SPA 4 CABIN LUX "THE PRESTIGE" Bedding configuration: 4 x queen. Extra bedding available on request at additional charge. Bedding is subject to availability. 3 night package from $6459 total per houseboat (max 8 people). Departures on Monday & Friday's Travel 01 Nov - 30 Nov 25, 01 Dec - 14 Dec 25, 17 Jan - 31 Jan 26, 01 Feb - 31 Mar 26 Flights are additional. Travel dates are subject to availability at time of booking. Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings until 31 Mar 26 or until sold out. • Prices are correct as at 15 Jan 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including exchange rate movements and availability • Coomera Houseboat packages are valid on Monday or Friday departure days. Customers driving the houseboat must present documentation of valid drivers license & or passport, be at least 18 years old & an understanding of English language is required to drive. Additional motor or generator charges may apply for any hour or thereof over the included hours per engine readings. Houseboat 3 night package is based on a maximum of 8 people in the Houseboat, ask us if you require rollways to be added to fit max 12 (additional cost) • Prepayment is required at time of booking.• All travel must be commenced and completed as specified. some surcharges & closeouts restrictions apply • Packages are subject to availability. • Flights are additional. • If additional accommodation is required due to flight schedules this is at customers own expense • Advertised prices are total for up to 8 people, based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Product is supplied by reputable suppliers with their own terms and conditions • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
